name: Discord Messages Fetcher
description:
Fetches a limited number of messages from a specified Discord channel using a bot token.

Set your bot token in config.
Choose the channel ID to fetch.
Set a limit on the number of messages to fetch.
Filter by user if needed.

You must first create a discord bot (https://discord.com/developers/applications), invite it to a server you administrate, and give it the permissions it requires.
